General.Name: Northern 3 Vct Plc
General.Description: Northern 3 VCT PLC is a venture capital trust specializing in direct and fund of funds investments. Within direct, the fund seeks to invest in middle market, later stage, mature and growth capital. Within fund of funds, it makes private equity fund investments. The fund invests in all sectors. It typically invests in the United Kingdom. The fund typically invests between £2 million ($3.11 million) and £10 million ($15.57 million) in companies with enterprise values between £10 million ($15.57 million) and £30 million ($46.77 million). It makes investments in quoted and unquoted smaller companies.
General.Address: Forward House, Henley-in-Arden, United Kingdom, B95 5AA
